items.sentence: Mary fell in love with a handsome young man.

Tom was the first boy that ever kissed Mary.

I think we\'re looking for different things.
I think we\'ve already wasted too much time.
I wonder if Tom will be in Boston next week.
I wonder whether or not Tom has another one.
Tom closed the book and turned off the lamp.
My mother and father aren\'t home right now.
By the way, I\'ve got to tell you something.

Tom is by far the smartest kid in our class.
